ingredients.ingredient: 4 (4 ounce) skinless halibut or haddock fillets
2 blood oranges or Valencia or Cara Cara oranges
3 tablespoons CARAPELLI® Extra Virgin Olive Oil
½ teaspoon coarse sea salt or kosher salt
½ cup very thinly sliced small fennel bulb

cookingTips: Slice fennel paper-thin using a mandoline for delicate texture and quick cooking
Segment oranges and squeeze juice over finished dish for bright acidity
Grill fish 3-4 minutes per side, finishing with a sprinkle of smoked paprika
enrichment.coachingPrompt: How will you incorporate the fresh orange and fennel to highlight rather than overpower the delicate halibut?
